email_chain.subject: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I hope this message finds you well. We are offering a shipment of 150,000MT of iron ore from Tubarão to Qingdao under CIF terms. The vessel OCEAN HORIZON is available for this route, with a freight quote of USD 25.50 per MT.

Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the offer. Could you provide more details on the vessel's DWT and LOA? Also, what is the laycan for this shipment?

Best,
Emily Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

The OCEAN HORIZON has a DWT of 180,000 and LOA of 300m. The laycan is flexible, but we are targeting a loading window starting around 2023-12-01.

Regarding the rate, we believe it is competitive given the current market conditions. However, we are open to discussions.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

Thank you for the additional details. We are considering combining cargo from a nearby port to optimize the vessel’s round trip. Could you provide a quote for a multi-port option?

Also, what is the demurrage rate per day?

Best,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

For a multi-port option, we would need to look at the specifics, but we can certainly discuss it. The demurrage rate is USD 20,000 per day.

Let me know if you have more details on the additional port and cargo size.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

We are looking at an additional 50,000MT from a port nearby Tubarão. Could you revise the freight quote considering this additional cargo?

Best,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Considering the additional cargo, we can offer a revised freight quote of USD 24.00 per MT. This rate takes into account the economies of scale with the increased cargo size.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

The revised rate looks good. We are ready to proceed with the shipment. Please confirm the laycan and stem details.

Best,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Great to hear that! We will confirm the laycan as 2023-12-01 to 2023-12-05. We will also ensure that the stem is ready by then.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Lucas
